text: kharun parannu: enre kaivasamulla vidyakeant matraman enikkitu labhiccatâ€Œ. ennal avannu mump avanekkal katutta saktiyullavarum, kututal sanghabalamullavarumayirunna talamurakale allahu nasippiccittuntenn avan manas'silakkiyittille? tannalute papannale parri kurravalikaleat anvesikkappetunnatalla
